Type.Name: GrabNotifyHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void GrabNotifyHandler(object o, Gtk.GrabNotifyArgs args);

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the GrabNotifyHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the GrabNotifyHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the GrabNotifyHandler is removed from the event.
